context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. Cloud data management. Azure and AWS integration.

competitors.name: Veritas Technologies
competitors.notes: Market leader in backup and recovery software with NetBackup as the flagship enterprise product. Maintained top position in the market in 2015.

competitors.name: EMC
competitors.notes: Second largest vendor in the data center backup market, offering comprehensive backup and storage solutions including Data Domain appliances.

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Third largest vendor with Tivoli Storage Manager and enterprise backup solutions competing in the data center market.

competitors.name: Veeam
competitors.notes: Fifth largest vendor in 2015, rapidly growing with agentless VM backup software for VMware and Hyper-V. Known for virtualization backup expertise and gaining significant market share.

competitors.name: Acronis
competitors.notes: Backup and disaster recovery vendor competing with comprehensive backup capabilities and integrated cybersecurity tools.

competitors.name: HP/HPE
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup vendor with data protection solutions competing in the data center backup market.

competitors.name: Arcserve
competitors.notes: Backup and disaster recovery software vendor serving the enterprise and mid-market segments.
